policy.comment: Default Sysdig policy bundle for new customers.
policy.name: Default Sysdig policy bundle

policies.comment:
This policy provides out of the box rules around Dockerfile best practices.
We frequently update these policies and if you'd like to modify the policy you should use this as a base template to avoid modifications being overwritten.
policies.name: Default Configuration Policy - Dockerfile Best Practices

policies.comment:
This policy interprets NIST 800-190 controls and provides out of the box rules to detect image misconfiguration.
We frequently update these policies and if you'd like to modify the policy you should use this as a base template to avoid modifications being overwritten.
policies.name: Default Audit Policy - NIST 800-190

params.name: value
params.value: alpine, busybox, centos, ubuntu, debian, fedora, ol

policies.comment:
This policy interprets PCI controls and provides out of the box rules to detect image misconfiguration.
We frequently update these policies and if you'd like to modify the policy you should use this as a base template to avoid modifications being overwritten.
policies.name: Default Audit Policy - PCI
